SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Levels

Class LevelTwo

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Levels.LevelParent
com.example.demo.Levels.LevelTwo
public class LevelTwo extends LevelParent
LevelTwo class represents second level of the game. LevelTwo class extends LevelParent class and implements specific behaviors for Level Two, such as enemy spawning, checking game over conditions and level transitions.

  • Constructor Details

    • LevelTwo

      public LevelTwo(String backgroundImageName, double screenHeight, double screenWidth, int playerInitialHealth, Controller controller, ComponentsFactory componentsFactory, AssetFactory assetFactory, AudioManager audioManager, javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Constructs new LevelTwo instance. Initialises the level with its background image, screen dimensions, player health, and other dependencies.
      Parameters:
      backgroundImageName - : name of background image for the level.
      screenHeight - : height of screen.
      screenWidth - : width of screen.
      playerInitialHealth - : initial health of the player.
      controller - : controller which manages the game flow.
      componentsFactory - : ComponentsFactory used for components creation.
      assetFactory - : AssetsFactory used for assets creation.
      audioManager - : AudioManager for playing audio.
      stage - : primary stage of application.

  • Method Details

    • initializeFriendlyUnits

      protected void initializeFriendlyUnits()
      Initialises the player's plane for the level.
      Specified by:
      initializeFriendlyUnits in class LevelParent

    • checkIfGameOver

      protected void checkIfGameOver()
      Checks if game is over based on player's status and number of kills. If player is destroyed, the game is lost. If player reaches kill target, then next level is loaded.
      Specified by:
      checkIfGameOver in class LevelParent

    • spawnEnemyUnits

      protected void spawnEnemyUnits()
      Spawns enemy units at regular intervals. Ensures that total number of enemies does not exceed maximum number allowed.
      Specified by:
      spawnEnemyUnits in class LevelParent

    • instantiateLevelView

      protected LevelScreen instantiateLevelView()
      Instantiates level view, which includes game screen and UI elements.
      Specified by:
      instantiateLevelView in class LevelParent
      Returns:
      LevelScreen: instance representing level view.

    • getKillTarget

      protected int getKillTarget()
      Gets kill target required to advance to next level.
      Specified by:
      getKillTarget in class LevelParent
      Returns:
      kill target.

    • userHasReachedKillTarget

      private boolean userHasReachedKillTarget()
      Checks if player has reached kill target.
      Returns:
      True ,if player has reached kill target, false otherwise.
